title: Help!
content:
I'd like some help.
RE: Theme Hospital

Does anyone know how to rip the music and/or the receptionist's announcements from it? They're really cool.

title: Re: Help!
content: Sounds like a job for szevvy...

title: Re: Help!
content: They might be normal sound files, maybe all squished into a few larger files - try grabbing a program like "Ripper 5" (or a newer alternative) and run it on the game files to see if it comes up with anything.

title: Re: Help!
content:
Mex supports the ripping of WAVs from Theme Hospital; grab it at [url=http://multiex.xentax.com/]multiex.xentax.com/[/url]------------------
[url=http://www.szevvy.net]www.szevvy.net[/url], for all your Wombat needs. You know you want to.
A member of the LevelLord fan club.

title: Re: Help!
content: Just out of interest: what will Wombat have that MultiEx doesn't? (Apart from being free, apparently)

title: Re: Help!
content:
If you are willing to wait 2 or so days (busy ATM) I'll write you up a sound ripper for Theme Hospital that gives correct names.

What will Wombat have? I'll put up a post in Miscell to let you know.------------------
[url=http://www.szevvy.net]www.szevvy.net[/url], for all your Wombat needs. You know you want to.
A member of the LevelLord fan club.

title: Re: Help!
content:
I am an evil double-poster [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

The Theme Hospital WAV Ripper is now available at [url=http://www.szevvy.net/downloads/TH_Wav_Ripper.zip]www.szevvy.net/downloads/TH_Wav_Ripper.zip[/url]

Gives correct filenames, too. The only thing I don't know is what two of the languages are; should someone be multi-lingual and recognises one of 'em let me know and I'll fix the folder names.

Important: the ripper extracts the WAVs into the current directory - so you *must* extract the exe somewhere before you use it, don't simply run it from within the zip or the extracted files will end up god knows where.

Enjoy.------------------
[url=http://www.szevvy.net]www.szevvy.net[/url], for all your Wombat needs. You know you want to.
A member of the LevelLord fan club.
